participant_2.background:
I spend my free time tinkering with new cellphone app ideas.
i enjoy listening to country music.
I am frugal and creative with my wardrobe.
i work as an interior designer.
I enjoy my tea while I am working on my goals, and it helps me stay focused and productive.

content.text: It's going well! I just had some tea and I am working on some interior design ideas.
That sounds fun! I am a teacher and I got my license last year.
Congratulations! That's a great achievement. I'm sure you're a great teacher.
Thank you! I hope so. I love helping kids learn.
What do you like most about teaching?
I love seeing the excitement on kids faces when they learn something new.
That's a great feeling! I can imagine.
What do you like to do in your free time?
I like to tinker with new cellphone app ideas and listen to country music.
That's cool! I like to listen to Ween to get my creative juices flowing.
I've never heard of Ween before. What kind of music is it?
It's a genre of rock music. They have a lot of different influences, but they're mostly known for their unique sound.
Interesting. I'll have to check them out.
You should! I think you'd like them.
